channel.title: Command help

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:337487”]This is how it should be set up.

if (command.startsWith("resettask")) { if(HasItemAmount(995, 100000000) { taskID = -1; taskAmount = -1; deleteitem(995, 100000000); sM("You slayer task has been reset, talk to Vannaka to get a new one."); } else { sM("You do not have enough money."); updateRequired = true; } }[/quote]

Thank’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Alright here’s my command.

if (command.startsWith(“resettask”)) {
taskID = -1;
taskAmount = -1;
sM(“You slayer task has been reset, talk to Vannaka to get a new one.”);
updateRequired = true;
}

What I’m trying to do is make it make you need like 100m, then tell you a message if you don’t have it, so I’m gusseing it would be something like this?

if (command.startsWith(“resettask”)) {
taskID = -1;
taskAmount = -1;
deleteitem: 995 500000;
else;
sM(“You do not have enough money.”);
sM(“You slayer task has been reset, talk to Vannaka to get a new one.”);
updateRequired = true;
}

Something like that right? If you could help me please post it in the correct form.

Read full topic
